name: CrossReferenceSources
shortdesc: A collection of cross reference text sources.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new cross reference text source.

parameter.name: source
parameter.shortdesc: The text or insertion point to create the source.

parameter.name: appliedFormat
parameter.shortdesc: Format used for cross reference source.

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new CrossReferenceSource &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the CrossReferenceSource.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReferenceSources within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The CrossReferenceSource, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: CrossReferenceSource, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The CrossReferenceSource, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: CrossReferenceSource, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first CrossReferenceSource in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last CrossReferenceSource in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle CrossReferenceSource in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the CrossReferenceSource that follows the desired CrossReferenceSource.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the CrossReferenceSource whose index follows the specified CrossReferenceSource in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The CrossReferenceSource whose index comes before the desired CrossReferenceSource.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any CrossReferenceSource in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every CrossReferenceSource in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CrossReferenceSource.
Returns the CrossReferenceSource with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
